knimeNode.name: Interactive Histogram
knimeNode.shortDescription: Displays data in a histogram view.

intro.p: Displays an interactive histogram view with different viewing options.

The user can change the following properties on the fly:
X axis
Aggregation column (Y axis)
Aggregation method (count, summary, average)
Number of bins for numerical attributes (incl. empty bars, excl. missing value )
The width of the bars
Show empty intervals
Show missing value bar
Zooming
...
The bars are colored by the number of rows per color attribute.
The binning labels are the borders of the bin which are included.

p.b: Please note: This node caches all data in the main memory to provide interactive functions. For huge data sets use the "Histogram" node.

ports.dataIn: The data table that should be displayed.
